comment: The new version of this app is extremely irritating. Queue option ,forward song option and some more features have now gone to premium and you need to click each song for listening it and also you cannot jump to some part of the song you love. All features where there in this app before update but now it is nothing more than pathetic. I'll recommend not to use this app if you like to listen music because very soon you'll get irritated .
key sentence: Key words: queue option, forward song option, premium, click each song, jump to some part of the song
the function of activity: The activity involves searching, library function, playing/pausing items, viewing downloaded songs/podcasts, downloading songs or podcasts, adding to playlists, shuffling a playlist, connecting to devices, previewing episodes, type replies to episodes and accessing history page, setting page
